  .. index::

     single: has regulatory component activity; RO_0002013

RO_0002013 - has regulatory component activity
====================================================================================

.. topic:: Alternate name for has regulatory component activity

    None


.. topic:: Definition

    A 'has regulatory component activity' B if A and B are GO molecular functions (GO_0003674), A has_component B and A is regulated by B.


.. topic:: Definition Source

    None


.. topic:: Example

    None


.. topic:: Editor's Note

    None


.. topic:: Term Editor

    None
